title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Unlock the potential of your baking and cooking with the stunning KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, the ultimate kitchen companion for any culinary enthusiast! Available in a rainbow of more than 20 eye-catching color variants, this iconic appliance is not only a statement piece but also a powerhouse that can handle your most ambitious recipes.

Imagine whipping up 9 dozen scrumptious cookies or kneading the dough for 4 substantial loaves of bread in a single batch. The KitchenAid 5 makes it a breeze with its impressive capacity and the revolutionary 59 touch points planetary mixing action, ensuring every ingredient is perfectly incorporated with no scraping necessary.

Crafted with a robust metal construction, the KitchenAid 5 comes equipped with a suite of top-tier accessories, including:

- A 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl that's not only sizable for all your mixing needs but also comfortable to handle and a cinch to clean, being dishwasher safe.
- A Coated Flat Beater, perfect for mixing cake batter, frosting, and cookie dough to perfection.
- A Coated Dough Hook that makes kneading bread dough a walk in the park.
- A 6-Wire Whip to infuse your whipped cream and meringues with the ideal amount of air for fluffy, cloud-like textures.
- A Pouring Shield that keeps your countertops mess-free while you add ingredients.

Explore a universe of culinary possibilities with the tilt-head design providing easy access to the bowl and attached beater or accessory. With 10 speed settings, you wield complete control, from a slow stir to a fast whip, all with the simple slide of a lever.

The customization doesn't end there; the KitchenAid 5's power hub fits more than 10 optional attachments (sold separately), transforming your mixer into a pasta maker, food grinder, vegetable spiralizer, and more!

Whether you're a baking novice or a seasoned chef, the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is the reliable, versatile kitchen aid that will inspire you to create and innovate for years to come. Elevate your kitchen game and bring home the appliance that's as serious about food as you are. Your culinary journey begins with the turn of a dial.
